trans-unit.source: Represents a segment of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un segmento di un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from PathSegment, such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment>, represent specific types of geometric segments.
trans-unit.target: Le classi che derivano da PathSegment, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment>, rappresentano tipi specifici di segmenti geometrici.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because PathSegment objects inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, they provide several special features: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **Funzionalità dell'oggetto Freezable:** perché gli oggetti PathSegment ereditano dal <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>(classe), forniscono numerose funzionalità speciali: possono essere dichiarati come, condivisi tra più oggetti, in sola lettura per migliorare le prestazioni, duplicati e resi thread-safe.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features that are provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulle diverse funzionalità fornite da <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>degli oggetti, vedere [panoramica sugli oggetti Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia modificabile di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> , eseguendo copie complete dei suoi valori.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per produrre copie modificabili di sola lettura <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings although they might no longer resolve.
trans-unit.target: Quando questo metodo copia le proprietà di dipendenza, copia delle associazioni dati e dei riferimenti di risorsa anche se non possono risolvere.

trans-unit.source: It does not copy animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Non copia le animazioni né i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Una copia completa modificabile dell'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Il <> </> *> proprietà dell'oggetto clonato restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> anche se il <> </> *> è di proprietà dell'origine<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> object by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia modificabile di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> oggetto, eseguendo copie complete dei suoi valori.

trans-unit.source: This method does not copy resource references, data bindings, and animations, although it does copy their current values.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo copia i riferimenti alle risorse, i data binding e le animazioni, sebbene una copia i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per produrre copie modificabili di sola lettura <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Una copia completa modificabile dell'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <> </> *> proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> anche se il <> </> *> è di proprietà dell'origine <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the join between this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> and the previous <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> is treated as a corner when it is stroked with a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il join tra questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> e precedente <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> viene considerato come un angolo tracciata con un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the join between this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> and the previous <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> is not to be treated as a corner; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il join tra questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> e precedente <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> non deve essere considerata come un angolo; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsSmoothJoin*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsSmoothJoin*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsSmoothJoin*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the segment is stroked.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il segmento viene tracciato.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> object has this property set to `true`, that object contributes to the stroked area of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> when rendered by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: Se un <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>oggetto questa proprietà è impostata su `true`, tale oggetto contribuisce all'area tracciata dell' <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>sottoposta a rendering tramite un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, the extra area added by a Pen affects hit testing and explicit operations to widen the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>.
trans-unit.target: Se questa proprietà è `true`, le operazioni di test ed esplicite per ampliare la <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry> di fatto clic nell'area aggiuntivo aggiunto da interessa una penna

trans-unit.source: When you switch between stroked and non-stroked <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> sections in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>, it is considered the same as the dashes of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: Quando si passa tra tracciato e non tracciati <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>sezioni in un oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>viene considerato equivalente ai trattini di un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashCap%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen> object determines the shape of the ends of stroked <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> objects.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashCap%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>oggetto determina la forma delle estremità del tracciato <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashCap%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the segment is stroked when a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref> is used to render the segment; otherwise, the segment is not stroked.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il segmento viene tracciato quando una <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref> viene utilizzato per eseguire il rendering di un segmento di; in caso contrario, il segmento non è tracciato.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsStroked*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsStroked*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsStroked*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
